metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42704 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Inkscape version 0.91 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which may allow an attacker to arbitrary execute code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-42704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

inkscape - 1.1.1-2ubuntu1
inkscape-tutorials - 1.1.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: inkscape package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-2ubuntu1').
